entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:59 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
